package.customCoverage.notSelected: Add the package to holdings to set custom coverage dates.
package.modal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this package and all its titles from your holdings? All customizations will be lost.
package.modal.body.isCustom: Are you sure you want to delete this package? By deleting this package it will no longer be available for selection and all customization will be lost. If a title only appears in this package it will no longer be available for selection.

resource.modal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this title from your holdings? By removing this title, you will lose all customization to this title in this package only.
resource.show.modal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this title from your holdings? All customizations will be lost.
resource.modal.body.isCustom.lastTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this title from your holdings? It is also the last title selected in this package. By removing this title, you will also remove this package from your holdings and all customizations will be lost.
